docs.snippet: The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday in its first meeting since President Donald Trump took office, but painted a relatively upbeat picture of the U.S. economy that suggested it was on track to tighten monetary policy this y...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday in its first meeting since President Donald Trump took office, but painted a relatively upbeat picture of the U.S. economy that suggested it was on track to tighten monetary policy this year.

headline.main: Fed Leaves Interest Rates Unchanged, Remains Upbeat on Economy
headline.print_headline: Fed Leaves Interest Rates Unchanged, Remains Upbeat on Economy
